prompt: I am going on vacation next week. Decline all meetings scheduled for next week and send an email to 'team@example.com' saying I will be OOO.
gold_response: Declined all meetings for next week and sent an OOO email to the team.

rubric.criteria: The agent must find all meetings scheduled for next week.
The agent must decline (cancel or update status to cancelled) all those meetings.
The agent must send an email to 'team@example.com' regarding the OOO status.
